DOC.brief_summary: There two primary objective address study : assess differential response bioavailability metabolic pathway lean obese individual expose acute , short term ( 14 day ) , long-term ( 10-week ) consumption polyphenol-rich fruit ( berry apple ) , beverage ( tea ) ; determine differential systemic gut anti-inflammatory response obese lean individual expose polyphenol-rich fruit ( berry apple ) , beverage ( tea ) .
DOC.brief_title: Adaptation Polyphenol Bioavailability Bioactivity During Long Term Exposure Polyphenol-Rich Foods
DOC.criteria: Younger 25 year old old 75 year old Use bloodthinning medication Coumadin ( warfarin ) , Dicumarol ( dicumarol ) , Miradon ( anisindione ) Presence gastrointestinal disease , metabolic disease , bariatric surgery , malabsorption syndrome may interfere study goal Have pregnant previous 12 month , currently pregnant lactating , plan become pregnant study Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin Fasting triglyceride great 300 mg/dL Fasting glucose great 126 mg/dL History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Use prescription overthecounter antiobesity medication supplement ( e.g. , phenylpropanolamine , ephedrine , caffeine ) least 6 month prior start study history surgical intervention obesity Active cardiovascular disease ( heart attack procedure within past three month participation cardiac rehabilitation program within last three month , stroke , history/treatment transient ischemic attack past three month , document history pulmonary embolus past six month ) . Use tobacco product past 3 month Unwillingness abstain herbal supplement two week prior study study Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction study food Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past twelve month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( Longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion )
